title: Stationery, "M&Co: Labs/ West 17th St.", early 1980s
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
1993-151-421a - Letterhead - Within a thinly outlined oval centered at the top of the white page, M&Co [lower case italics]/ Labs [upper case, smaller, sans serif type] are imprinted. To the right, the company telephone number is imprinted in a curved format. The left margin of the address is aligned with the center and is imprinted in small capitals about one inch below the company name. Near the left edge of the paper, aligned with the address, the FAX number is imprinted in a convex format.
Just above the lower edge of the page and to the right of center, M&Co/ A Design group, Inc. [italics in a concave format] are imprinted.

1993-151-421b - Envelope - On smooth kraft-type paper, M&Co and the address are imprinted in a broken circle in the top half, left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stationery, "M&Co: Labs/ West 17th St.", early 1980s.
early 1980s. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-421.
